name: Graphware
description:
Founded in early 2015, Graphware Ltd. is a startup IT company. The company's main business service is the design and development of cloud-based, integrated management systems in the agricultural and healthcare sectors.
Graphware is currently a beneficiary under FP7 in the Agrifood sector. Our development team is well versed and experienced in software architecture, including both low-level and high-level programming, as well as system implementation.
